name: Blacktop Splitscreen Demo
description:
Blacktop is a 1970s driving games in which you smuggle moonshine and escape police cars.

It is inspired heavily by 1970s car chase movies such as Gone in 60 Seconds, Vanishing Point, and Moonrunners.

The game is currently two and a half years in development. Driving physics are complete, Split-screen multiplayer is complete, and a lot of back-end stuff is in place to continue development.

Due to having enrolled film school, development is going to be very slow and mostly restricted to holidays or any time off I can find. I hope to continue actual development when I graduate.

Enjoy!

Press "P" to change time of day.
